dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5037 IH: Fair Access for Individuals to Receive Leave Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Porter (for herself, Mrs. Hinson, Ms. Stevens, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Connolly, Mr. Allred, Mr. Lynch, Mr. Nadler, Mr. Beyer, Ms. Norton, Mr. Pocan, Mr. Moulton, Ms. Lee of California, Mr. Cohen, and Ms. Kuster) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on House Administration, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993, to repeal certain limits on leave for married individuals employed by the same employer.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fair Access for Individuals to Receive Leave Act or the FAIR Leave Act.

section.header: Repeal of certain time limitations on leave for spouses
section.text: Section 102(f) of the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 (29 U.S.C. 2612(f)) is repealed.
